DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate initial fit toric contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Clinical Evaluation Soft Toric Lens Designs
DOC.criteria: Be great equal 18 year old . Read , understand , sign write Statement Informed Consent . Appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . Be exist soft contact lens wearer ( extend wear last 3 month , silicone hydrogel daily wear allow ) . Require visual correction eye ( monovision allow monofit ) . Have spherical contact lens requirement range 0.50D 6.00D . Have astigmatism 0.50 2.00DC eye . Monocular distance visual acuity correctable 6/9 ( 0.2 logMAR ) good eye best spherocylindrical refraction . Have normal eye evidence ocular abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : Clear cornea , No anterior segment disorder , No clinically significant slit lamp finding ( i.e . oedema , stain , scar , vascularisation , infiltrate abnormal opacity ) , No active ocular disease recent surgery Having wear RGP contact lenses within last 30 day PMMA contact lenses within last 3 month . Clinically significant corneal oedema , corneal vascularisation , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Extended lens wear last 3 month . Any systemic topical medication investigator 's opinion affect ocular physiology contact lens performance . Any systemic disease affect ocular health . Abnormal lacrimal secretion . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Pregnancy , lactate plan pregnancy time enrolment . Participation concurrent clinical trial . Any previous anterior ocular surgery . Subjects know infectious systemic disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) . Subjects know immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV positive ) . Subjects know diabetes . Employees family member Research site , Principal Investigator study team .
